name: Demonic Dream Defenders
description:
DDD! - Demonic Dream Defenders

Currently this game is in development. All criticism and feedback is accepted. Thanks!

Choose your defender and start defending people from bad dreams! DDD! is a 2D, pixel game that requires a good mouse - otherwise your mouse will break form excessive clicking. Defend the people by destroying the flaming skulls that try to get to the sleeping person.


Features (not all done yet)
  • Fully 2D pixel game.
  • Click on skulls to inflict damage.
  • Upgradeable stats and Powerups for you to use
